segments.text: Hi Joe . You met my new assistant , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Emm ... yes . But I wasn't too impressed . I found her a little stuck up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are kidding , but she's so helpful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tom ... you are her boss , you kown.Of course , she's helpful to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . She's like that with everyone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so actually . She never even says " hello " to me .
segments.speaker: S2
